Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = true
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("NO MOUSE") return end
while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to Go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(.01) end print("Setting Mouse to Wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png"
while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

-- Ice Axe --
r = game:service("RunService")
local Tool = script.Parent local IceAxe = Tool.Handle
-- damage local damage = 10 local swingDamage = 12
Tool.Enabled = true
--Animation local SwingAnim
--Sounds axeSwirl = Tool.AxeSwirl
-- On Slash function slash(hit) local humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local vCharacter = Tool.Parent local vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) local myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local MSReducer = Tool.MSReducer:Clone() if not MSReducer then print("OMG WHERE IS IT?") end if humanoid ~=nil and humanoid ~= myHumanoid and myHumanoid ~= nil then rightArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if(rightArm ~= nil) then local joint = rightArm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if(joint ~= nil and (joint.Part0 == IceAxe or joint.Part1 == IceAxe)) then if not hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("MSReducer") then MSReducer.Parent = hit.Parent MSReducer.Disabled = false end tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) wait(1.0) untagHumanoid(humanoid) end end end end
-- Tagging and Untagging for leaderboards function tagHumanoid (humanoid, player) local creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Value = player creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Parent = humanoid end
function untagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid ~= nil then local tag = humanoid:FindFirstChild("creator") if tag ~= nil then tag.Parent = nil end end end
function swing() damage = swingDamage end
local bodyRotVelocity = nil
-- On Gear Activation, this function is called function onActivated() if not Tool.Enabled then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
local character = Tool.Parent local myHumanoid = character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not myHumanoid then return end myTorso = character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if not myTorso then return end
--smoke = IceAxe:FindFirstChild("Smoke") --if smoke then -- smoke.Opacity = 1 --smoke.RiseVelocity = 5 --smoke.Size = 10 -- THIS LINE IS BREAKING IT!! (10.0 breaks it) --end
bigSmoke = Instance.new("Smoke") bigSmoke.Name = "BigSmoke" bigSmoke.Opacity = 1 bigSmoke.RiseVelocity = 5 bigSmoke.Size = 10 bigSmoke.Color = Color3.new(204/255, 1.0, 1.0) bigSmoke.Parent = IceAxe
smoke = IceAxe:FindFirstChild("Smoke") if smoke then smoke.Enabled = false end
-- Give the player an angular velocity -- He rotates about 2 full cycles with this velocity bodyRotVelocity = Instance.new("BodyAngularVelocity") bodyRotVelocity.P = 250000 bodyRotVelocity.maxTorque = Vector3.new(bodyRotVelocity.P, bodyRotVelocity.P, bodyRotVelocity.P) bodyRotVelocity.angularvelocity = Vector3.new(0.0, 10.0, 0.0) bodyRotVelocity.Parent = myTorso
SwingAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.AxeSwing) SwingAnim:Play() -- Axe's orientation in the players hands while rotating Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0.02866, 0.4855, -0.8738) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(-1.0, 0.01391, -0.0250) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0.0, -0.8741, -0.40)
--smoke = IceAxe:FindFirstChild("Smoke") -- if smoke then -- smoke.Opacity = 1 --smoke.RiseVelocity = 5 --smoke.Size = 10 -- THIS LINE IS BREAKING IT!! (10.0 breaks it) --end axeSwirl:Play() wait(1.5)
if smoke then smoke.Enabled = true end
if IceAxe:FindFirstChild("BigSmoke") then IceAxe.BigSmoke:remove() end
-- Change rotation back to default Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0.0, -1.0, 0.0) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(-1.0, 0.0, 0.0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0.0, 0.0, 1.0) -- if smoke then -- smoke.Opacity = 0.2 -- smoke.RiseVelocity = 0 -- smoke.Size = 0.2 --end if bodyRotVelocity ~= nil then bodyRotVelocity:Remove() end damage = 10.0 wait(1.0) -- Stop the music axeSwirl:Stop() Tool.Enabled = true end
-- Axe Equipped function onEquipped() smoke = IceAxe:FindFirstChild("Smoke") if smoke then smoke.Enabled = true end --smoke = Instance.new("Smoke") --smoke.Color = Color3.new(204/255, 1.0, 1.0) --smoke.Opacity = 0.2 --smoke.RiseVelocity = 0.0 --smoke.Size = 0.2 -- smoke.Parent = IceAxe -- print("Smoke Added") end
-- Axe Unequipped function onUnequipped() if SwingAnim then SwingAnim:Stop() end if axeSwirl then axeSwirl:Stop() end if bodyRotVelocity ~= nil then bodyRotVelocity:Remove() end
Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0.0, -1.0, 0.0) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(-1.0, 0.0, 0.0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0.0, 0.0, 1.0)
if IceAxe:FindFirstChild("BigSmoke") then IceAxe.BigSmoke:remove() end smoke = IceAxe:FindFirstChild("Smoke") if smoke then smoke.Enabled = true end end
-- Event Listeners Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
connection = IceAxe.Touched:connect(slash)

-- Injection Script that reduces the character's speed
local Tool = script.Parent
local walkSpeed = Tool:FindFirstChild("Humanoid").WalkSpeed
local count = 0
for j = walkSpeed, 0, -2 do if count < 5 then Tool:FindFirstChild("Humanoid").WalkSpeed = walkSpeed - j wait(1.0) count = count + 1 end end
Tool:FindFirstChild("Humanoid").WalkSpeed = 16.0
wait(2.0)
script:Remove()
